system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: The user may freely move up to the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack. This attack ignores [Defensive] Abilities and effects of valid targets. If this attack deals super-effective damage to a target, that target gains Paralysis 5.
Requirement: [Miraidon] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Electro Drift on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Calamitous Paradox Upsurge

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
